title: Teen shot on Melville dies from injuries
content:
A Rochester teen shot late Thursday on Melville Street has died from his injuries.
Abraham Owten, 17, was shot in the upper body about 11 p.m. The teen died from his injuries just before 10 p.m. Friday at Strong Memorial Hospital, said Rochester police investigator Jackie Shuman.
Officers were called to Melville and Denver streets, near Webster Avenue, after receiving a ShotSpotter notification late Thursday, said Rochester Police Capt. Gary Moxley. Officers found Owten outside with at least one gunshot wound to his upper body, Moxley said.
Officers have not released further details on the slaying. As of Friday, no charges were filed in connection with the homicide.
VFREILE@Gannett.com
